Just today, one of my friends on Yahoo mail had their account broken into a=
nd me and my friends received the fraudulent email.  Apparently there is a =
rash of accounts being broken into on yahoo.   Before it happens to you, th=
ere is something you can do to prevent intrusion.   And here it is:

1:  Si=
gn into your account info.

2: Scroll down to SECOND SIGN IN VERIFICATION.
=

3: Click on that, it will send you a verification number and give you the =
option 
Of sending that number to another email, other than yahoo, or throu=
gh your mobile phone, which is ten times safer by the way.

4:  If you have=
 a mobile number, click on the option to just send it through there rather =
than the email.

5:  The verification code will need to be verified on the =
computer.  Type the number exactly how it was sent to you and then you're d=
one.

What this will do is make it impossible for hackers to access your ac=
count.  If they try an unauthorized login they will fail miserably.  There'=
s more info related to this in your account profile section.  It's really w=
orth the time investment.
